name: AabConvertToUniversalApk
friendlyName: Android App Bundle converter to universal Apk
description: Generate an universal Apk from your Android App Bundle
author: Damien Aicheh

inputs.name: aabFilePath
inputs.label: Android App Bundle path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repo root to the Aab you want to transform

inputs.name: keystoreFilePath
inputs.label: Keystore file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the keystore file that was uploaded to `Secure Files` to be used to sign the APK.

inputs.name: keystorePassword
inputs.label: Keystore password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the password for the provided keystore file. Remember to store the password in secure variables.

inputs.name: keystoreAlias
inputs.label: Keystore alias
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the alias of the keystore

inputs.name: keystoreAliasPassword
inputs.label: Keystore alias password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the password for the alias and keystore file.

inputs.name: outputFolder
inputs.label: The folder where the universal apk will be send.

inputs.name: bundletoolJarPath
inputs.label: Custom bundeletool jar path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a custom bundletool jar path if you need and don't use the InstallBundletool task.
